name: Warehouse and Logistics Simulator
description: Are you ready for your new challenge? Get ready to take over the control of your original "Jungheinrich" Forklift! Just the best drivers will level up in the Highscore list. The fastest drivers will receive a special bonus. Enjoy the game in full 3D and feel the realistic driving experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Pentium 2,4 GHz Pentium or equal AMD Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 6800GT / ATI Radeon HD3650 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Pentium 3,0 GHz Pentium or equal AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX560 / ATI Radeon HD6970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I drive a forklift for a living. I got this game in a bundle and was curious how realistic it was. It isn't. It has 0 physics in it so objects don't behave naturally. In addition, the game is just horrifyingly boring. I would much rather go to work than to play this game. In fact, the government should force people to play this game for hours at a time as a form of torture.

I really felt like I was working a low-income lift operator job! I wish there were some achievements like getting a smoke break or a promotion to shift lead... also kind of disappointing that I can't runover any customers in the store. Please make the impaling a possibility in the net release/update!
This game will break your heart and crush your soul.  It's neat that they got a Tangerine Dream rip-off to do the soundtrack, all two songs of it.
Way harder than real life...feels unrealistic and the physics are %&Â¤%. :)
I really do hope working a forklift in a warehouse is like this, drifting around in a dodgy forklift, listening to odd music and running over customers without a care to give.
10/10.. If it were any good ._. My god! Please.. Just put a tutorial in. *spams keys until he finds the correct keys* What's that? If you spam enough you find the key layout? Sigh..

Do NOT buy this game, I got this in a Bundle Star Bundle for $1 with all the other bad Simulator Games on steam. It is not worth anything at all. It is a shame because the forklift models look nice and are easy to control. But that is it, it looks like they spend all the time modeling the Forklifts, and then spend an afternoon for the rest.
Heed the other reviews. This game is terrible.
pallets are outside of the map on some tasks making it rediculously unable to pass !

You pick things up and put them down. The graphics are awful, and the game is highly unoptimized. The only reason I am rating this as good is since it allowed me to do exactly what it said, pick things up and put them down. On a side note, the DLC is wierd.
This is terrible. Awful. Unforgivable. Don't do it. Not even for a joke. It isn't funny and you aren't big and clever.
Awful game, poor gfx, horrible colission detection , and ghost people, what is the point of this   AVOID

I feel bad ripping on this game because I got it as a gift. If my gifter sees this review, thanks for thinking of me. Simulators are my favorite. You were thoughtful in getting me a sim. I don't recomend this one though. It's the most unimaginitive sim I have ever played. You have nothing to do with warehouse logististics. There's no planning, mangement, or coordination. All you do is drive a forklift. You pick up the pallet. You put down the pallet. Rinse, repeat.
Awful controls, unrealistic physics and a painful campaign expierience. Don't get this game, it's good for some laughter through mocking its poor gameplay, but otherwise, it just sucks
